subject: [sugar] Testing Frameworks
body: Hi All,I am developing a sugar activity using pygame.  I was thinking about learning nose for unit testing the activity, but am not sure I should given that it is not part of the standard lib and might not be supported by the XO build process.  Is there a preferred python unit testing framework to use, or can we use what we want?Cheers,Julius -----------------------------------------------------http://openwetware.org/wiki/User:Lucks-----------------------------------------------------
